title: Royal Frozen Food Recalls Beef and Chicken Products Due to Misbranding and an Undeclared Allergen
summary: WASHINGTON, April 17, 2015 Royal Frozen Food, a Los Angeles, Calif. establishment, is recalling approximately 3,821 pounds of beef and chicken products due to misbranding and an undeclared allergen, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The products contain...
